text: geudaedeul-ege joh-eun geos-i dah-ass-eul ttae geudeul-eun geugeos-eul guj-eun geos-eulo bad-adeul-igo geudaedeul-ege nappeun geos-i il-eonass-eul ttae geudeul-eun geugeos-eulo gippeohadeola. geudaedeul-i innaehago (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehandamyeon geudeul-ui gyelyag-eun geudaedeul-ege geu eotteon haedo kkichiji moshal geos-ila. sillo hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-i haenghaneun geos-eul ewossasineun bun-ila
